column4: I know this is #ubuntu, but I'm just curious about gmail because I've been having on/off problems with it for a week or so, ever since upgrade to lucid. is that a coincidence or are others having problems too. anyone with a gmail account, can you connect right now?

I'm using firefox and I do have quite a few google labs enabled so I'm wondering where to begin troubleshooting this. it would be so much easier if you all just told me none of you can connect right now either ;)
install some other browser and check it like that is what i'd do
lol, tomorrow I'll look into more and I'd be very surprised to find that nobody is maintaining it. if you like podcasts, it's a great podcatcher. I'll take it over myself if it comes to it!
